text: Awei (also Île Ui, Îlot Awé ) is a small uninhabited island in Malampa Province of Vanuatu in the Pacific Ocean. It is a part of the Maskelyne Islands archipelago. ==Geography== Awei lies some 400 meters off the south coast of Malekula Island. The neighboring island is Vulai. The estimated terrain elevation above sea level is just 1 meter. The island area is some 40 hectares. ==References== Category:Islands of Vanuatu Category:Malampa Province
title: Awei (Vanuatu)
